channel.title: I really am confused lol
channel.description: ok ive compiled my server i click run......and i says starting server on ip 0.0.0.0...firstly should this be it then i leave it.......then secondly..ive made a no-ip thing how do i link this to the runserver..i think ive portforwarded correctly :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2007, 05:17:18 AM[/size][hr]with portforward im using 4200 siemens....i have set static ip...i cant find a tutorial...what i dont undertstand is how the running the server on 0.0.0.0 can be linked to the no-ip stuff..

item.title: I really am confused lol
item.dc:creator: @PeterLoL PeterLoL
item.description:
@PeterLoL wrote:

Ok.
If i am correct.
You don’t need to link it.
All it has to do is link the game to the ip.
But it automaticly does that.
So all you gotta do is post the no-ip.
And then people will be able to connect.
Post it here and run the server i will try and log on.

Read full topic
